    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public int delete(boolean flush,
         java.lang.Long... ids)
        Description copied from interface: DeletableDAO
        Remove permanently the entities whose identifiers are contained in the array ids, optionally flushing the changes to the database. Returns the number of entities removed. If any identifier does not correspond to any existent entity, do nothing on it and continue the deletion. Any exception thrown by the underlying implementation is encapsulated in a DaoException.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface DeletableDAO<Ad>
        Overrides:
        delete in class BaseDAOImpl<Ad>
        Returns:
        the number of removed entities

      • fullTextSearch

        public java.util.List<Ad> fullTextSearch(FullTextAdQuery adQuery)
                                  throws DaoException
        Description copied from interface: AdDAO
        Searches for Ads using a full text search, sorting results by relevance. The searched fields using keywords are:
        • title
        • description
        • custom fields
        • owner name
        • owner username
        • owner email
        • owner custom fields
        Specified by:
        fullTextSearch in interface AdDAO
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • getNumberOfAds

        public java.lang.Integer getNumberOfAds(java.util.Calendar date,
                               java.util.Collection<? extends Group> groups,
                               Ad.Status status)
        Description copied from interface: AdDAO
        Get the number of ads of the given status and at the given date, and with the member belonging to the given group.
        Specified by:
        getNumberOfAds in interface AdDAO
        Parameters:
        date - usually the enddate of a period
        groups - a Collection containing the group of which the number of ads is requested. If this is an empty collection, the param is ignored.
        status - the ad status requested
        Returns:
        an Integer with the number of ads.

      • search

        public java.util.List<Ad> search(AdQuery query)
        Description copied from interface: AdDAO
        Searches for Ads. The results are expected to be ordered by publication start descending, or randomly if randomOrder is true on the query parameters. If no entity can be found, returns an empty list. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, it should be wrapped by a DaoException.
        Specified by:
        search in interface AdDAO
